tool.name: SAGA.sim_hydrology.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayCHANNEL False isArrayWEIGHT False isArrayRAIN False output_data_DELIVERY $output_data_DELIVERY output_data_RISK_POINT $output_data_RISK_POINT output_data_RISK_DIFFUSE $output_data_RISK_DIFFUSE name SAGA.sim_hydrology.4 DEM $DEM CHANNEL $CHANNEL WEIGHT $WEIGHT WEIGHT_DEFAULT $WEIGHT_DEFAULT RAIN $RAIN RAIN_DEFAULT $RAIN_DEFAULT METHOD $METHOD CHANNEL_START $CHANNEL_START prefer $prefer response $response outputType_DELIVERY $OutputSection_DELIVERY.outputType_DELIVERY transmissionMode_DELIVERY $OutputSection_DELIVERY.transmissionMode_DELIVERY outputType_RISK_POINT $OutputSection_RISK_POINT.outputType_RISK_POINT transmissionMode_RISK_POINT $OutputSection_RISK_POINT.transmissionMode_RISK_POINT outputType_RISK_DIFFUSE $OutputSection_RISK_DIFFUSE.outputType_RISK_DIFFUSE transmissionMode_RISK_DIFFUSE $OutputSection_RISK_DIFFUSE.transmissionMode_RISK_DIFFUSE

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: CHANNEL
param.label: Channel Network
param.help: Channel Network The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: WEIGHT
param.label: Land Cover Weights
param.help: Land Cover Weights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: WEIGHT_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: RAIN
param.label: Rainfall
param.help: Rainfall The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: RAIN_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: CHANNEL_START
param.label: Channel Initiation Threshold
param.help: minimum number of upslope contributing cells to start a channel

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_DELIVERY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_RISK_POINT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_RISK_DIFFUSE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Diffuse Pollution Risk Mapping.<br/>This tool tries to reproduce in parts the methodology of the <a target="_blank" href="http://www.scimap.org.uk/">SCIMAP - Diffuse Pollution Risk Mapping - Framework</a>.<br/><br/>References:<br/>Lane, S.N.; Brookes, C.J.; Kirkby, M.J.; Holden, J. Vol. 18, S. 191-201.<br/><br/>Milledge, D.G.; Lane, N.S.; Heathwait, A.L.; Reaney, S.M. (2012): A monte carlo approach to the invers problem of diffuse pollution risk in agricultural catchments.
